attributes.action: employers give key workers a bonus for working through the covid-19 pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Because everyone deserves some sort of appreciation pay for keeping the business going through the pandemic. People get danger pay in certain jobs so i think everyone should be getting hazard pay for working through this. Especially with it being such a serious virus
attributes.background: I think every key worker that has worked through and during the covid-19 should get some sort of bonus or hazard pay for risking theirs and their families lives by going out to work through it

rejection.details:
Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845
